attributes.action: House uk's British citizens homeless people before migrants
attributes.background: If thousands of migrants/refugees can be housed..what about out homeless that are on our streets? This country should put these poor people first!!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107542

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
